articles.title: Scientists identify secret ingredient in Leonardo da Vinci paintings
articles.description: "Old Masters" such as Leonardo da Vinci, Sandro Botticelli and Rembrandt may have used proteins, especially egg yolk, in their oil paintings, according to a new study.

articles.title: Letters, Nov. 13, 2025: This ‘may be the beginning of the end of Canada’
articles.description: Let the man work I read the article putting down Carney for apologizing to Trump. I can see why, and, if the author who wrote the editorial actually had been observant, he/she would know also. Trump is an unstable egomaniac who retaliates if his little feelings get hurt. articles.title: Silicon Valley Bank collapse renews calls to address disparities impacting entrepreneurs of color
articles.description: When customers at Silicon Valley Bank rushed to withdraw billions of dollars last month, venture capitalist Arlan Hamilton stepped in to help some of the founders of color who panicked about losing access to payroll funds.

articles.title: Big-box stores could help slash emissions and save millions by putting solar panels on roofs. Why aren't more of them doing it?
articles.description: As the US attempts to wean itself off its heavy reliance on fossil fuels and shift to cleaner energy sources, many experts are eyeing a promising solution: your neighborhood big-box stores and shopping malls.

articles.description: Eliot Pence wants to undercut US reliance and build Canada’s “defence prime.” The post Dominion Dynamics’ CEO thinks defence is a “generational opportunity” for Canadian entrepreneurs first appeared on BetaKit.

articles.title: Ukraine working on exchange deal to bring home 1,200 prisoners: Zelenskyy
articles.description: Ukraine is working to resume prisoner exchanges with Russia that could bring home 1,200 Ukrainian prisoners, as per agreements brokered in Istanbul.

articles.title: Jewish Montrealer pushes back when passport officials tell her Israel can’t be named as her birth country
articles.description: Alternatively, she was told she could have indicated her birth country as 'Palestine'

articles.title: Letters, Nov. 16, 2025: ‘End of a CFL era’
articles.description: Losing our game This Sunday will be the 112th and last Canadian Football League Championship game. The league will roll out an Americanized version of our game next season. articles.title: Despite Trump's cane sugar activism, Canadian Coke drinkers should get used to high-fructose corn syrup
articles.description: Cane-sugar Coca-Cola has now begun rolling out, but in another snub to Canada, there are no plans to bring it north of the border

articles.title: HILL and THOMPSON: Mayor Farkas should retain ‘blanket rezoning’ for sake of Calgarian families
articles.description: Blanket rezoning was always contentious. Debate over the policy back in spring 2024 sparked the longest public hearing in Calgary’s history, with many Calgarians airing concerns about potential impacts on local infrastructure, parking availability and park space — all important issues.

articles.title: Not only is Lake Powell's water level plummeting because of drought, its total capacity is shrinking, too
articles.description: Lake Powell, the second-largest human-made reservoir in the US, has lost nearly 7% of its potential storage capacity since 1963, when Glen Canyon Dam was built, a new report shows.

articles.title: What can we take from a couple of Ottawa Charge pre-season losses to Toronto 24 hours apart?
articles.description: Ottawa dropped its second of two tuneups in 24 hours to the Toronto Sceptres on Monday, falling 3-0 at TD Place.

articles.title: City of Ottawa staff revise bubble bylaw scope in response to federal hate crimes bill
articles.description: According to a memo sent on Monday afternoon, the bylaw will now complement and address issues not included in Combatting Hate Act.

articles.title: Premiers hint at ‘significant’ tariff relief to come after Carney meeting
articles.description: New Brunswick Premier Susan Holt said premiers had a "productive" meeting with Carney that focused on the federal budget and progress on tariff talks with the United States.

articles.title: Tom Cruise on his first Oscar: Making films 'is who I am'
articles.description: The Mission: Impossible star received the honorary prize after being nominated four times for an Academy Award.

articles.title: This tiny quantum clock packs a billion-fold energy mystery
articles.description: Scientists built a tiny clock from single-electron jumps to probe the true energy cost of quantum timekeeping. articles.title: Federal budget lacks ‘direct support’ for auto workers: Unifor local president
articles.description: Officials and workers in the automotive sector say they're concerned targeted support wasn't made available in the federal budget.
